input: Consider the following statements and select the correct answer from the codes given below : Assertion (Q) : Collective responsibility of the Cabinet signifies unity and coordination among members of the Council of Ministers. Reason (R) : It is the prerogative of the Prime Minister to select or drop a member of the Cabinet. Codes :

options.A: Both Q and R are individually true and R is the correct explanation of Q
options.B: Both Q and R are individually true but R is not the correct explanation of Q
options.C: Q is true but R is false
options.D: Q is false but R is true
